## Primary exercises

1. Make a variable `heightInMeters` that contains your height expressed in meters.

```{r}
heightInMeters <- 1.75
```

2. Use the variable `heightInMeters` to calculate your height in cm.

```{r}
heightInMeters * 100
```

3. Store the result of the previous calculation in a variable.  
Show the value of the new variable.

```{r}
heightInCentimeters <- heightInMeters * 100
heightInCentimeters
```
